*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Elias R. Wightman, April 27, 1829. Arrangements concerning land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="04-27-1829">April 27. 1829*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Mr Elias E Wightman*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sir, My object in making the offer of the *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*when you was here, out of the *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Jones */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Kuykendall */person_mentioned*Leagues*/location_mentioned* was to enable the *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned*that came with you to have a place to go on to immediately, and not as a matter of speculation— I am now willing that you should take the quarter out of the *location_mentioned*Jones League */location_mentioned*in exchange for the part my *person_mentioned*brother */person_mentioned*has in the *location_mentioned*Matagorda tract*/location_mentioned*—this will close that business and relieve you from the necessity of making an immediate settlement on it—*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned*who are at *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Huff */person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned*have all determined to settle on the *location_mentioned*Bernard*/location_mentioned*, as I am informed—none of them will therefore go to the *location_mentioned*Colorado*/location_mentioned*— I will give one Labor gratis to any *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*who will settle on the *location_mentioned*Kuykendall League west of the river,*/location_mentioned* by the *date_mentioned n="10-01-1829">first of October next*/date_mentioned*, he paying for the title—*/p*
*p*I return you the two instruments of writing you sent me unsigned— It does not suit me to agree to the alteration you wish for the necessity, or rather the reason on which the offer was made has ceased, for the *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned*at*location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Huff*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* as I before observed have determined to settle on the *location_mentioned*Bernard*/location_mentioned*—and the present arrangement will suit you better than the other, for the *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Jones*/person_mentioned* quarter*/location_mentioned* is worth two of the *location_mentioned*Crownover League*/location_mentioned*, and you can remain where you are during the whole season—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
